text: João Bosco Cabral (born 7 July 1975) is a Timorese retired professional footballer who previously line up for Bali Devata and the East Timor national football team.National-Football-Teams Profile ==Career== ===Persija=== Spending 2006 to 2008 with Persija Jakarta, Cabral was regarded as an important part of their defense.5 Pemain Persija yang Punya Rambut Nyentrik Jacatra.net ===Following retirement=== Never vacillating between retirement and continuing his football career, the Timorese defender became a travel agent and tour guide in Bali since 2013,Jadi Agen Travel, Eks Pemain Persija Raup Omzet Puluhan Juta Bola.com actively following the development of Indonesian football.Hati Joao Bosco Terbelah buat Timnas Indonesia dan Timor Leste Bola.com ==Personal life== Cabral is a devout Christian.Eks Pesepak Bola Asli Timor Leste Ini Rasakan Damai Natal di Bali Juara.bolapsort.com == References == == External links == * Bolaskor.com Interview * Mengenal Kompetisi di Timor Leste yang Mulai Menggeliat Category:Association football defenders Category:1975 births Category:Timor-Leste international footballers Category:Persija Jakarta players Category:PSPS Pekanbaru players Category:Living people Category:Expatriate footballers in Indonesia Category:Persikota Tangerang players Category:East Timorese footballers Category:Bali Devata F.C. players
title: João Bosco Cabral
